personalInfo.name: Jagapathi Banoth
personalInfo.title: Software Developer & Tech Enthusiast
personalInfo.tagline: I create amazing digital experiences with clean code and modern technologies.

description: Hello! I'm Jagapathi Banoth, a passionate software developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. I enjoy creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.

My journey in technology began with curiosity and has evolved into a professional career where I continuously learn and adapt to new technologies. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices in software development.

projects.title: Calculator Application
projects.description: A fully functional calculator built with modern web technologies. Features include basic arithmetic operations, memory functions, keyboard support, and a clean, intuitive user interface with responsive design.

projects.title: Exam Preparation App
projects.description: An interactive exam preparation platform I'm currently developing. Features include practice tests, progress tracking, study materials, performance analytics, and personalized study plans to help students excel in their exams.

projects.title: Upcoming Project
projects.description: Currently planning my next exciting project. Stay tuned for updates on innovative solutions that combine cutting-edge technology with practical applications.

education.institution: University of Central Lancashire, Preston, UK
education.description: Completed MBA with 75% marks. Gained comprehensive knowledge in business strategy, management, finance, and entrepreneurship. Developed strong analytical and leadership skills applicable to technology ventures and business development.
Graduated with 70% marks. Built a strong academic foundation that complemented my technical skills and business acumen, preparing me for a career combining technology and business expertise.

Completed Intermediate with 85% marks in Biology, Physics, and Chemistry (BiPC). Strong performance in science subjects laid the foundation for analytical thinking and problem-solving skills essential for software development.
Achieved 7.5 GPA in SSC examinations. Demonstrated consistent academic excellence and developed strong fundamentals in mathematics and sciences that support my current technical career.
